description:
Pregnancy is an incredibly special time in a woman’s life. Every expectant mother wants to do all she can to have a safe pregnancy and to ensure the best possible outcomes for her child. Not only are you meant to “eat for two”, but you also need to provide the optimum nutrition for your baby’s proper development. Additionally, you must also take steps to ensure your own safety by minimizing potential risks like gestational diabetes and low amniotic fluid.
While modern doctors have some parts covered – for example, by adding vitamins and minerals like iron or folic acid to your diet – there is still so much more that needs to be done, to ensure the best outcomes for mother and child.
name: Fertility
